answers.answer: I was induced at thirty six weeks with my son. It was a slow process but everything went good, he was healthy! :-) good luck.
Due date Dec.23 and will be getting induced on Dec.15.(onlyBecauseIaskedToo) Only 1 week earlier. But I been having high BP maybe I'll be gettin a cSection this Thursday if it doesn't go down :(
Did you get to choose to be induced and did you have any health problems
Also how long after your induced did it take till he was born
You are full term at 37 weeks :)

I would wait unless there is a health problem and you need to be induced. They found babies are still doing a lot of important developing thru 38 weeks. 37 weeks starting next year will no longer be considered full term.
I only wish I could get the option to be induced. I'm 35w + 2 days & I'm in so much pain. I say go with your gut. But after 37 weeks you're considered full term momma.
I asked if I can be induced, when this happened I was in perfect health, until yesterday I was diagnosed with possible preeclampsia.  Baby is still not here.
I have alot of cramping and pressure. Also my braxton hicks are getting stronger and more frequent
I'd say go with what you want to do. I'm 37 weeks and am starting the induction process Friday
Why are you being induced. Im excited but nervous

It may be exciting to be induced early.. But now doctors say that babies aren't full term until 39 weeks and are still developing there lungs and organs. I'd wait to be on the safe side, but it's your decision. Good luck! :)
@ excitedftm why are u being induced momma?

I didnt have health problems my doctor said my baby was large enough to come and fully developed. If i had waited he said most likely id have to have a c section. I did get to chose but now i am going to wait. It took twenty four hours and with my daughter only ten. I just have no patience for it and also think it was rushed......
I was just told i was dialated. And he asked if i wanted to be induced around christmas so i would be 38 or almost 39 weeks by then

question: My doctoe said i have a choice to be induced. Im due jan 1st with no complications or health problems. He said the baby is head down and im dialated a little bit. Im currently 36 weeks. Is this safe? He said the induction will be around christmas
title: induced before due date?
